meanings.definition: A person or thing that summarizes.
meanings.sent1: The summarizers in the class always help me understand the main points.
meanings.sent2: I rely on online summarizers to give me a quick overview of articles.
meanings.sent3: The little robot acted as a summarizer, condensing the long story into a few sentences.
meanings.sent4: Her brain worked like a summarizer, extracting the key details effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The summarizers at the meeting made the complex report easy to grasp.

meanings.definition: A tool or software used to condense information.
meanings.sent1: I used a summarizer to shorten the lengthy document.
meanings.sent2: The summarizers on my computer help me save time when writing essays.
meanings.sent3: The magical summarizer shrunk the book into a single page!
meanings.sent4: The app functioned like a summarizer, compressing the data into a neat summary.
meanings.sent5: The summarizers online are great for quickly getting the gist of an article.
